summary: This document is a forwarded email from January 30, 2020, containing a link to a news article from Fox Wilmington. The article's headline calls for Prince Andrew to cooperate in the Jeffrey Epstein investigation and to give up Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Mentioned in the forwarded news article headline as someone who must cooperate in the Jeffrey Epstein probe and give up Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the investigation referenced in the forwarded news article headline.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned in the forwarded news article headline as someone Prince Andrew is being called to 'give up' in the Epstein probe.

connections.description: Implied connection as Prince Andrew is called to cooperate in the Epstein investigation.
Implied connection as Prince Andrew is called to 'give up' Ghislaine Maxwell in the Epstein probe.
Implied association as Maxwell is mentioned in the context of the Epstein investigation.

events.title: News article call for cooperation
events.description: A news article is published calling for Prince Andrew to cooperate in the Jeffrey Epstein investigation and to give up Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A news article from January 30, 2020, calls for Prince Andrew to cooperate in the Jeffrey Epstein probe.
The article specifically calls for Prince Andrew to 'give up' Ghislaine Maxwell.
The document is a forwarded email containing a link to the Fox Wilmington news article.
